ground: ∀ (a b c : Point) (BC : Line), (Point.onLine b BC ∧ Point.onLine c BC ∧ b ≠ c) ∧ a ≠ b → ∃ l, |(a─l)| = |(b─c)|
guarded_test: ∀ (grd_a grd_b grd_c : Point) (grd_BC : Line), (Point.onLine grd_b grd_BC ∧ Point.onLine grd_c grd_BC ∧ grd_b ≠ grd_c) ∧ grd_a ≠ grd_b → ∃ grd_l, |(grd_a─grd_l)| = |(grd_b─grd_c)| ∧ grd_a = grd_b
